summary: The best 7 year old golfers from around the world descend on the world famous Pinehurst Golf course in North Carolina to determine the next world champion and who might become golf's next ... See full summary »
cast: Amari Avery|Jed Dy|Allan Kournikova|Zamokuhle Nxasana|Alexa Pano|Sky Sudberry|Augustin Valery|Yang Kuang|Jack Nicklaus|Gary Player|Annika Sörenstam|Chi Chi Rodriguez|Don Law|Dan Martin|John Nieporte|Alla Kournikova|Geoff Nxasana|Pumla Nxasana|Sizwe Nxasana|Judy Nxasana|Gavan Levenson|Zhi Wei Kuang|Brian Symonds|Rick Pano|Donna Sarino|Lani Dy|Bob Dy|Bobbett Bruce|Maryi|Mario|Ryan|Mike Credo|Sabine Cordesse|Bob Sudberry Jr.|Marv Kostelecky|Sally Johnson|Bob Sudberry Sr.|Mary Jo Sidberry|Donnie Massengale|Andre Avery|Brian Schwartz|Liz Hardy|Maria Avery|Alona Avery|Robin Sudberry|Bob Toski|Dan Van Horn|Justin Sun|Rafe Cochran|Edd Hall|Jennifer Van Horn|Tiger Woods
title: The Short Game
